    • Method Detail

      • onColorItemClick

        public void onColorItemClick(int position)
        Specified by:
        onColorItemClick in interface OnColorItemClickListener

      • show

        public void show()
        Shows the dialog box using AlertDialog.Builder using layout_color_palette_view.xml.

      • setOnSelectColorListener

        public ColorPickerBottomSheetDialog setOnSelectColorListener(OnSelectColorListener selectColorListener)
        On using OnSelectColorListener the bottom sheet dialog box would have the positive and negative buttons. It would be fired on pressing either of the buttons.

      • setOnDirectSelectColorListener

        public ColorPickerBottomSheetDialog setOnDirectSelectColorListener(OnDirectSelectColorListener directSelectColorListener)
        On using onDirectSelectColorListener the bottom sheet dialog box would not have the positive and negative buttons. It would be fired as soon as a color is pressed.

      • setColors

        public ColorPickerBottomSheetDialog setColors()
        Sets the colors from array defined in this library (arrays.xml). In total 15 default colors would be added.
        Returns:
        this

      • setColors

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • setColorItemShape

        public ColorPickerBottomSheetDialog setColorItemShape(ColorItemShape colorShape)
        Set the shape of color item. SQUARE and CIRCLE are the two shapes available. By default, SQUARE would be selected.
        Parameters:
        colorShape - (shape of color item)
        Returns:
        this

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        this

      • setDefaultSelectedColor

        public ColorPickerBottomSheetDialog setDefaultSelectedColor(int defaultColor)
        Sets the default color when bottom sheet dialog pops up. Default color would have a tick mark on the color.
        Parameters:
        defaultColor - (default color int value)
        Returns:
        this

      • setDefaultSelectedColor

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        this

      • setTickColor

        public ColorPickerBottomSheetDialog setTickColor(int tickColor)
        Sets the color of tick mark on item in color palette on every color item selected. Default color is white.
        Parameters:
        tickColor - (tick color on item in palette)
        Returns:
        this

      • setTickColor

        public ColorPickerBottomSheetDialog setTickColor(int tickColor,
                                                 int... colorItems)
        Sets the color of tick mark on particular items in color palette. These items would have the color passed in this method. Default color is white.
        Parameters:
        tickColor - (tick color on item in palette)
        Returns:
        this
